about.title: About LinguaCraft
about.description: We're on a mission to make English learning accessible, engaging, and effective for everyone, regardless of their background or starting level. Our platform combines cutting-edge technology with proven pedagogical methods to create a truly personalized learning experience.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To empower individuals worldwide to master English through innovative, personalized, and community-driven learning experiences that build confidence and open doors to new opportunities.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: A world where language barriers don't limit potential, where every person has access to quality English education, and where learning is an enjoyable, social, and transformative experience.

whyWeStarted.title: Why We Started LinguaCraft
whyWeStarted.text: As a developer passionate about using technology for good, I saw the lack of effective digital tools for language learners. I started LinguaCraft to create a smarter, more intuitive platform that blends community, personalization, and innovation â€” all driven by modern tech.

coreValues.title: Personalized Learning
coreValues.description: Every learner is unique. Our adaptive technology creates personalized learning paths that match your pace, style, and goals.

coreValues.title: Community-Driven
coreValues.description: Learning is better together. Our global community of learners and native speakers creates an immersive environment for practice.

coreValues.title: Inclusive & Accessible
coreValues.description: We believe everyone deserves access to quality education. Our platform is designed to be inclusive and accessible to all learners.

coreValues.title: Continuous Innovation
coreValues.description: We constantly evolve our platform based on the latest research in language learning and user feedback to provide the best experience.
